Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, and Broadway: due to, parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, Broadway and over the regular route, due to parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near Kinzie between Clark and State
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rrtd NB: State, Wacker, Dearborn, Illinois, State; SB: State, Grand, Clark, Wacker, State; due to blockage at Kinzie btwn Clark & State

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie between Clark and State, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Dearborn, Illinois, then resume their normal route on State.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Grand, Clark, Wacker, then resume their normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kinzie between Clark & State
ShortDescription: Southbound 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Grand, Clark, Wacker & State, due to street blockage near Kinzie between Clark and State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Grand, Clark, Wacker, then resume their normal route on State, due to street blockage near Kinzie between Clark and State.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
